    camprotR

    The camprotR package is an internal package written and used by the Cambridge Centre for Proteomics to facilitate our proteomic analyses. It is opinionated by design and most functions assume the data has been processed by Proteome Discoverer.

    Install

    remotes::install_github("CambridgeCentreForProteomics/camprotR", build_vignettes = TRUE)

    How to use

    Several HTML vignettes are installed with this package which go through how to use different aspects of the package. You can see a list of available vignettes with:

    browseVignettes("camprotR")
